callouts.text:
Before you begin
Role required: rota_admin , rota_manager
Note: SMS and voice require that Notify is active.

locations.text: Note: SMS and voice require that Notify is active.

text.content: Override all shift members' contact preferences to enforce a communication channel, for example, in case of an emergency.
Use one of the following methods to open the Edit Escalation and Contact Preferences page:
. The On-Call Schedules page opens to the All On-Call Schedules tab.
tab, click the Actions icon for the shift and select
Select the contact methods that the instance should use for all shift members for the selected contact attempt.
Depending on your instance configuration, you can specify any or all of the following notification methods:
Note: SMS and voice require that Notify is active.
Set up Microsoft Teams as a contact method for an on-call escalation
Set up mobile push as a contact method for an on-call escalation

tab, click the Actions icon for the shift and select
